import React from 'react' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions'; const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem: {name, imageUrl, price, quantity, id}}) => (
{name} {quantity} {price}
removeItem(cartItem)}className="remove-button">✕
) const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ removeItem: (item) => dispatch(removeItem(cartItem)) }) export default CheckoutItem
